title: (x) Petals - hand scripted {Tiff}
content:
Any Ideas on this script font?  
I am guessing it is manipulated but I am looking  
for a good place to start.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [petals.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928123212/http:/typophile.com/files/petals.jpg) | 31.58 KB |

 [‹ What is this 50's looking font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928123212/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15327 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) TIME cover type - ITC Franklin Compr {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928123212/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15320 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Veseyjl

comments.content: Handlettered. Too organic for regular typography.
Check out the scripts from [Umbrella Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928123212/http:/www.veer.com/products/vendor.aspx?vendor=UMT) at Veer.
